SELECT tj.name, tj.emId, tj.orgId, tj.crCount, tj.`status`, tj.bridgeDuration, tj.averageDuration, tj.rate, tj.averageTime FROM
(
SELECT em.user_name AS NAME,em.id AS emId, em.`status` AS state,em.org_id AS orgId,
IFNULL(cal.bridgeDuration,'00:00:00') AS bridgeDuration, IFNULL(cal.crCount,0) AS crCount, IFNULL(cal.status,0) AS `status`, IFNULL(cal.averageDuration,'00:00:00') AS averageDuration, IFNULL(cal.rate,'0.00') AS rate, IFNULL(cal.averageTime,'00:00:00') AS averageTime
FROM `employee_info` em LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(cr.id) AS crCount,#致电次数 SUM(CASE WHEN (cr.status = '双方接听' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `status`,#致电接通次数 SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(cr.bridgeDuration))) AS bridgeDuration,#致电通话时长 #致电通话时长/致电接通次数 平均致电通话时长（时:分:秒） SEC_TO_TIME(CONVERT(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(cr.bridgeDuration))/SUM(CASE WHEN (cr.status = '双方接听' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),DECIMAL(18,0))) AS averageDuration, #致电接通率 致电次数*100/致电接通次数 CONVERT(SUM(CASE WHEN (cr.status = '双方接听' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) *100/COUNT(cr.id) ,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS rate, #CONVERT(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(cr.bridgeDuration)) / ('2017-01-05'-'2016-12-05'),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS averageTime, #平均每日通话时长（时:分:秒) 致电通话时长/天数 SEC_TO_TIME(CONVERT(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(cr.bridgeDuration)) / (TO_DAYS(IFNULL(#{params.normalDate1},'9999-01-01')) - TO_DAYS(IFNULL(#{params.normalDate},'1990-01-01'))),DECIMAL(18,0))) AS averageTime, cr.`cno`,cr.startTime
FROM call_record cr
WHERE 1=1 AND callType='点击外呼'
and (DATE_FORMAT(startTime,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY cno ) AS cal ON cal.cno = em.`cc_phone`
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and tj.emId in
#{params.emIds[${index}]}
and orgId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY CONVERT(tj.name USING gbk) ASC
